content: this until later switch to red yarn round 14 double_crochet in each st switch to yellow yarn rounds 15-16 single_crochet in each st switch to brown yarn round 17 *single_crochet double_crochet* round 18 *double_crochet single_crochet* round 19 *single_crochet double_crochet* switch back to tan yarn rounds 20-22 half_double_crochet in each st round 23 single_crochet in each st fasten_off and weave in all ends finishing using the green yarn and tapestry needle sew down the lettuce ruffle taking care not to make it too tight which will keep the hat from stretching properly some people prefer to leave the lettuce ruffle as it is totally up to you embroider sesame seeds using off-white/ivory yarn and tapestry needle make a tear-drop shaped outline and then fill it in using the green yarn and tapestry needle sew down the lettuce ruffle taking care not to make it too tight which will keep the hat from stretching properly 2 cheeseburger hat | http //devinlikestoknit wordpress com |
